Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: Block incoming attacks, and retaliate with willpower.
moveset: summon a spectral shield to ward off the enemy.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description: Hurl an orb of elemental flame.
moveset: conjure and throw a ball of fire
throw a flaming orb at the enemy

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description: Regain some health, at the cost of mana.
moveset: release a spark of golden light
